headline: B.F.F.s
abstract: In “Friendship: The Evolution, Biology, and Extraordinary Power of Life’s Fundamental Bond,” Lydia Denworth explores the growing, cross-species science of friendships — how they work and why.
lead_paragraph: FRIENDSHIP The Evolution, Biology, and Extraordinary Power of Life’s Fundamental BondBy Lydia Denworth
keywords: Friendship: The Evolution, Biology, and Extraordinary Power of Life's Fundamental Bond (Book)
